analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  gantha gantha niyaduka
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs

original: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo🔽ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca
analyzed: na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca dhammam paṭicca na a ganthaniyaḥ  ca iva na no ca ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na ganthañca iva na a ganthaniyañca
translated: The Pairs on Knotted and Unknotted

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano ca gantho🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo ceva nanogantho🔽ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no ca gantho  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham dhammam paṭicca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no gantho  ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a knotted and unknotted state as condition, there arises a knotted and unknotted state. With a knotted and unknotted state as condition, there arises an unknotted state. With a knotted and unknotted state as condition, there arises a knotted state. With a knotted and unknotted state as condition, there arise a knotted state and an unknotted state.

original: nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano
analyzed: na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no
translated: With an unknotted and knotted state as condition, there arises an unknotted and knotted state. With an unknotted and knotted state as condition, there arises a knotted state. With an unknotted and knotted state as condition, there arises an unknotted state.

original: ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano
analyzed: ca gantham dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no
translated: Dependent on a knot and a phenomenon that is not a knot, a phenomenon that is not a knot arises.

original: ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a knot and a phenomenon that is a knot, a knot arises.🔽Dependent on a knot and a phenomenon that is a knot, a phenomenon that is not a knot arises.

original: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham ca dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: Dependent on a knot and a phenomenon that is a knot, a knot and a phenomenon that is not a knot arise.🔽(In detail, as in the case of the knot.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
translated: In the case of cause, there are nine; … in the case of result, there is one; … in the case of non-causality, there are nine. (In all cases, in detail, as in the case of the knot.)
